title: The mountain that could fall into a scenic Norwegian fjord
text: As Norway prepares to create 10 new national parks, Travel Show reporter Rob Bell explores the country's wild west, home to many of its most iconic fjords. He meets a team of experts keeping an eye on a growing crack in the Ã…kernes mountain. It is one of the most hazardous rock fractures in the world and will eventually make the mountain crash down into one of Norway's deepest fjords below.
